text: us se kaha gaya ke mahal mein chali chalo, jise dekha ke ye samajh kar ke ye hauz hai, us ne apni pindliya khol di, farmaya ye to sheeshe se mondhi hoyi imaarath hai, kehne lagi mere parvardigaar! main ne apne aap par zulm kiya, ab main Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) ke saath Allah rabbul aalameen ki muti aur farma bardaar banti hoon
